name: IGNIS FATUUS #13 - THE CONFERENCE OF THE BIRDS
description:
The story of a flock of birds in search of the true king, Simorgh, who lives on the mountain of Kaf. Drawn from all species, the flock travels through the seven valleys: quest, love, understanding, detachment, unity, amazement, and death. The birds that endure reach the mountain to learn a profound lesson: that Simorgh the king is, in fact, each of them and all of them. A lyrical and richly illustrated story of love, faith, and the beauty of the human journey.
- the conference of the birds

//SERIES
IGNIS | FIRE
FATUUS | FOOLISH

MEANING | "FOOLISH FIRE"
